body:
Y'all should stop trying to tell an artist what he needs to draw. 

People that say things like "he need to stop ruining everything by drawing the most fucked up looking girls they can and stop throwing in the most disgusting side-fetishes they can think of" are fucking imbeciles. Don't tell the man what to do, if you dislike it, just gtfo and let the artist have his peace, god damnit
Am i the only one who loves the big inverted nipples style?
when lolists talk about boobs wrong in many ways. palm.  degenerative incliners teach us what is normal. palm
... i like the premise of the story but.. the boobs.. those freaking boobs is just so wrong in many ways.
Such a waste of art for such a dumb premise.

I'm a big fan of bestiality hentai/erotica and stuff, but my god the artists need to stop ruining everything by drawing the most fucked up looking girls they can and stop throwing in the most disgusting side-fetishes they can think of.
This one would've been perfect but her breasts are too fucked up for my liking. And the thought of a dog gnawing on soft breasts to begin with? *shivers
